paragraphs: This is the accursed armor I wore when I defied Dagon. It's no ordinary  mail but a captive servant of Malacath, and the trickster's mark is on  it, for it led me into folly.
As near as I can remember it's called the Hide of the Saviour and the  Scourge of the Oath-breaker and long may it hang here out of my sight,  for I wish I'd ne'er used it.
